name: AddAttachmentToTrelloCard
description:
Attach a file or link to a Trello card.

Use this tool to add an attachment to a specified Trello card by providing the card ID. Suitable for adding relevant documents or links directly to your Trello tasks.

parameters.name: attachment_name
parameters.description: The name of the attachment to be added to the Trello card. Maximum length of 256 characters.

value_schema.description: The name of the attachment. Max length 256.

parameters.name: file_attachment
parameters.description: The path to the file to attach, provided as multipart/form-data.

value_schema.description: The file to attach, as multipart/form-data

parameters.name: attachment_mime_type
parameters.description: The MIME type of the attachment, such as 'image/png' or 'application/pdf'. Max length 256.

value_schema.description: The mimeType of the attachment. Max length 256

parameters.name: attachment_url
parameters.description: A URL to attach to the Trello card. It must start with `http://` or `https://`. This URL will be linked as an attachment.

value_schema.description: A URL to attach. Must start with `http://` or `https://`

parameters.name: use_attachment_as_cover
parameters.description: Set to true to use the new attachment as the cover for the Trello card.

value_schema.description: Determines whether to use the new attachment as a cover for the Card.
